name: Sandlashed Survivor
aura: Increase Ally  in in all Battles by 25

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on the target for 1 turn if this Champion has no debuffs. 
Heals by 15% of the damage inflicted if this Champion is under any debuff.
